column1: full, a tiny bit of shape in towards middle and leg, clipped away through backward square leg. Came off the inside half of the bat
back of a length on middle and leg, clipped watchfully to midwicket
ooh, good ball. Back of a length again, pitching within the stumps and slanting away, and this one nips away off the seam to beat Liton's hesitant prod
back of a length, finishing on an off-stumpish line, defended into the covers
a touch shorter, slants into a fourth-stump line. Lets it come on and guides it to third man with an open face
length ball close to off stump, decent stride forward to block it back to the bowler
fullish outside off, defended to mid-off
full again, slanting away from off stump, searching for swing and not really finding it. Nice stride forward to drive to mid-off
nice length, still quite full but not driveable, and Liton judges it well and leaves it alone. Carries through at chest height to Sarfraz
full on off stump, clipped to mid-on
very full, yorker length outside off. Liton is beaten as he tries to jam his bat down and squeeze it away through point
length ball on middle and off, defended to midwicket and Shaheen starts with a maiden
fullish, angling down leg. Looks to flick, misses, and the ball ricochets off his pad towards square leg
back of a length, slanting away from off stump, steered down to third man
length ball close to off stump, gets on the front foot to play a checked drive to mid-off
nice length again, brings him half-forward. Slightly wider line, lets it come on and punches to cover point

out for a duck on comeback, and that's very well bowled. He's been bringing him forward with his lengths so far, and he digs this one in short, and outside off stump. Gets it up to shoulder height, and Soumya is in no position to control his pull. Ends up skying it and offering a simple catch to square leg. Mohammad Amir has been struggling for wickets, and his replacement strikes in his second over
nice length, fairly full outside off, left alone. Hardly any carry this time, bounces a second time before it reaches the keeper
back of a length close to off stump, Liton opens his bat face and picks up yet another single to third man
back of a length, angling into off stump, worked away to deep square leg
full on middle and leg, flicked to the left of fine leg
shot! That's gorgeous from Mominul, an effortless flick between midwicket and mid-on, but the ball was a gift, overpitched and angling into middle and leg

and he follows up with a beaut and beats Mominul for pace! Back of a length, pitches outside off and nips back in off the track, skids off the wicket and Mominul is late bringing his bat down in defence. Didn't really matter, because it would have beaten his inside edge anyway. Cannons off the back pad and leaves his off stump spinning. Pakistan's left-arm quicks are on fire here
and Shaheen greets him with a sharp bouncer that he has to duck hurriedly under
length ball angling into off stump, defended back to the bowler

oh my, what a delivery that is! This is what any left-arm quick going round the wicket dreams of seeing. Perfect length, pitching on off stump and straightening past the outside edge to hit top of off. Not too much Liton could have done about it - maybe take a bigger stride forward in defence?
full outside off, driven to cover point
length ball angling into middle stump, clipped towards midwicket
back of a length close to off stump, defended towards short extra-cover

ooh, Mithun was a little late spotting that change in length. Banged it in and got it to rise to just about neck height, all while angling the ball in towards off stump. Ducks quickly and just about evades it
back of a length on off stump, defended into the covers

ooh, edged. Just a wide slip in place, though, and it flies well wide of that fielder and rolls down to third man. Back of a length, pitches outside leg and nips away from the right-hander, accentuating the angle across. Mushfiqur defends close to his body, and the extra bounce causes the ball to kiss the edge high up, near the shoulder of the bat
full outside off, driven to mid-off
lovely length, pitching on middle and slanting away from off stump. Left alone
ooh, opens him up completely. Again it nips away after pitching on or around leg stump, and the length leaves him rooted to the crease. Beats his edge and the batsman's right leg slides around
overpitched outside off, but the covers are packed and he can't beat the fielder at short extra-cover with a firm drive
length ball angling in towards off stump, defended back to the bowler

ooh, goes wider on the crease and angles this one in. Takes a bigger stride across than he needs to to defend, and almost finds his front pad in the way as he brings his bat down. Would have struck him outside the line anyway, but
fullish, angling in towards off stump. Mushfiq reaches for the ball as he looks to drive through mid-off, plays too early, and sends it rolling to mid-on off the inside half of the bat
back of a length, angling into off and middle. Gets nicely behind it and defends it with soft hands. Ball drops down by his feet
another bouncer, rising over leg stump. Mushfiq thinks of hooking and decides late not to play the shot. Called wide for height - it did bounce over head height
short again, rises over off stump at shoulder height. Mushfiq controls his pull well, keeps it down to the left of long leg
length ball angling into off stump, defended towards mid-on
again, the massed cover field protects Shaheen from the consequences of a wide half-volley. Mushfiq drives straight to cover point
length ball, closer to off stump, defended into the covers
back of a length, slanting away from off stump, left alone
back of a length on middle and off, lets it come on and defends into the point region
dug in short, gets it up to chest height but offers plenty of width, and Mushfiq gets on his toes to slash it high over point
back of a length on middle stump, lets it come on and defends with soft hands into the off side. Thinks of a single but Shaheen is quick to extend his follow-through and cut off that option
very full and quite wide too. Reaches out to drive and ends up slicing it down to third man
fullish, close to off stump, transfers his weight nicely forward to punch to extra-cover
overpitched on off stump and Mushfiq's placement is perfect on this occasion. Waited a tiny bit longer and opened his bat face just a touch to drive to the left of the diving extra-cover fielder

length ball outside off stump and he beats Mushfiq's outside edge without necessarily doing a great deal with the ball. Mushfiq was a little slow getting forward, and ended up pushing uncertainly at the ball
fuller, wider, slashed away to the right of third man. Was in the air for a bit but was always dipping down before reaching the fielder
fullish outside off, punched to extra-cover

big appeal after he strikes the pad with an arm ball, not given out. Seemed to be heading down leg, and Pakistan make a late decision to review after a long consultation between bowler and keeper/captain... The length trapped him on the crease in defence, and the lack of turn beat the inside edge, but that's a shocking review. The ball has struck his pad outside leg stump!
nicely bowled, fairly quick, drifting in towards middle stump. Wanted to drive to long-off, and ended up playing it back to the bowler as a result
down the track but can't reach the pitch of this. Flicked to midwicket
full on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
fired in quick on leg stump, clipped to deep square leg
length ball angling into middle and off, defended into the on side after taking half a stride forward
angling in from outside off, and the length ball is steered to point with the bat's open face for a single
bowls a heavy ball full on off stump, and he frees his arms to clatter a drive through to the sweeper fielder on the off side
length ball outside off, and he tries to punch this to cover. Comes off the bat's outside-half, and dribbles away to deep point
length ball landing just outside off, and he pushes this off the front foot to cover point. Four singles in a row

edged! And there's no slip fielder to gobble that up. Just wide outside off, and he tries to drive this ball through the covers. The delivery's not full enough, and therefore it takes the bat's outside edge. Past Sarfraz's right for a boundary
full on middle, and this is tapped off the front foot to mid on. No chance of a single on this occasion
full on leg stump, and he guides this off his pads to short fine leg. Says no to the single
tossed up on middle stump, and he takes a big stride forward to caress this towards the non-striker
full on off, and he goes down on one knee to slog-sweep! But the ball takes an inside edge, and ricochets onto his front leg before dribbling behind the keeper
full just outside off, and this is firmly driven to wide long off for a walking single
full on off once again. No spin on this surface for now. Tapped off the front foot to cover point, and he wants the single. But the non-striker shouts 'no'
full on leg stump, and he comfortably nudges this to the vacant square-leg region for a quick run
length ball on the fourth-stump line, but angling into the batsman. He goes onto the back foot, and fends from near his chest
good length outside off, and Mushfiqur check-drives off the front foot. Beats the cover-point fielder and trickles away to the man in the deep
back of a length outside off, and Mushfiqur waits for the delivery to come to him, before opening his bat's face and running this down to third man for a single
full on off stump, and he defends this past the bowler to mid on. Mithun wants the single, so he's halfway down the pitch, but Mushfiqur says no. The non-striker has to hurry back
full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to drive through the ball's line. Struck well, but straight to mid off
length ball just outside off, and Mushfiqur's front-foot drive comes off the bat's inside half. Splices the shot to mid on
tossed up right outside off stump, and he caresses a front-foot drive past the bowler's left to long off
full on middle stump, and he shuffles across to the off side to get inside the line of the ball... and then paddles a sweep right over the fielder at short fine leg! Excellent shot
uses his feet to this length ball outside off. Taps it towards cover point and wants the run, but the non-striker says no
full on off stump, and he attempts to slog-sweep. Mistimes the shot to deep backward square
length ball on middle stump, and he misses the flick off his pads. The ball hits his front leg, but impact's nowhere near the line
good length outside off, and he waits for the angling ball to come to him, before slapping a square cut to the fielder placed in the deep
lands a length delivery outside leg stump, and he clips this off his pads to the leg side
full outside leg stump, and he pushes this away to midwicket off the front foot. Stopped by the fielder
flighted on his toes, and he caresses this past midwicket's right to the man in the deep
full on leg stump once more, and Mushfiqur defends with soft hands towards the leg side
flatter ball, lands on middle stump,  and he nudges this off his hips to square leg for a quick single
good length on middle stump, and angling across the batsman. Rocks back onto the back foot, and slaps this in front of square to the cover boundary. Excellent shot to end the over. Drinks
full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot. Dribbles away to cover
full just outside off, and he picks the wrong'un well! Goes down on one knee, and slogs this right over the fielder at midwicket
full just outside off, and straightens after pitching. He keeps his eyes on the ball, and runs this fine to short third man
wrong'un again. Lands outside off, and spinning into Mushi. He makes some room, and cuts this hard, but finds the fielder on the circle
reverse sweep! Innovative from Mushfiqur. Shadab goes full outside off, and he quickly changes his position, and then paddles this fine psat the short third-man fielder. Fifty partnership too
full on off, and he comes onto the front foot to defend. Takes an inside edge and flies away to the leg side
full outside leg stump, and clipped to the vacant square-leg region. Fakhar gives it a chase from midwicket
full on leg stump, and tapped off the front foot to midwicket. No chance of a single on this occasion
tossed up just outside leg stump, and he nudges this off his toes to deep square leg. Calls early for the seond run, and they complete it with ease
back of a length on leg stump, and spinning further down leg. He sticks his bat out, and flicks this off his pads to short fine leg
good length on middle, and he opens his stance, and paddles this right over the keeper's left to short fine leg. Innovative once again
flat on middle stump, and that's been easily clipped off his hips to deep square leg for a walking single
tossed up on off stump, and he drives through the ball's line to long on. Not off the bat's middle, but enough behind that shot to take it down the ground
tossed up right on off stump, and the ball's turning in. Defended off the front foot
tossed up on leg stump, and he converts this into a full toss. Drives down the ground to long on
full just outside off, and he defends. But the ball takes an outside edge, and flies past the keeper's right to third man
good length, but wide outside off. The ball's spinning inwards, and he punches this off the back foot to the bowler
extra rip on this delivery. Lands full outside off, and he drives this against the spin to mid off. Can't pinch the single
full on middle stump. No grip off the surface so far, and tapped off the front foot. The ball rolls back to Nawaz
full on middle stump, and he whips this off his pads to square leg for a single. Uses his wrists to place this behind square
full just outside off, and he pushes this down the ground, but the ball takes an outside edge and runs away to deep point. The slowness allows them to come back for the second
back of a length outside off, and he punches this off the back foot to mid off
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. The ball rolls back to Nawaz
full on off stump, and he pushes this down the ground to long off
full just outside off, and the legbreak is pushed past the bowler's left to long off
full on off stump, and he takes a huge stride forward. Then taps it with soft hands towards the leg side
fuller outside off, and this time he can free his arms. Crunches a slap past the fielder at cover for a single
full just outside off, and expectedly spinning into the batsman. Defended towards cover
full and wide outside off, and this time he drives through the ball's line to wide long off
back of a length outside off, and he rocks back to cut this square to Shaheen at deep point. A good diving effort ensures it's not a boundary.

looks to sweep, and that's dangerous, given that this ball starts within the line of the stumps, and there's a polite lbw appeal from the bowler - didn't straighten that much, and would probably have missed leg stump. Hawkeye would have returned an umpire's call verdict anyway, clipping the outside of leg stump
slower, goes deep in his crease to nudge it gently to the right of midwicket
full, angling down leg, and Mushfiq tickles it away nicely to the right of short fine leg
length ball sliding in towards middle stump, and that's another nicely taken single - just a gentle push into the leg side, and Imam is right on the edge of the circle at midwicket
back of a length on off stump. Looks to punch towards long-on and the bowler dives to his right in his follow-through to cut it off
tossed up outside off, driven to long-off
flat and full outside off, presses forward to push to extra-cover
ooh, nice flight outside off and it dips a little shorter than Mushfiq expects as he comes forward to drive. Pops it in the air, but to the right of the diving extra-cover fielder
nice variations of pace here. Flatter and quicker again, the front-of-the-hand slider skidding on towards off stump. Goes back and dabs into the point region
fuller and straighter, clipped into the square leg region
googly, turning in towards off stump, goes on the back foot to punch into the point region
short outside off, stops on the batsman so he can't really hit this square. Flat-batted to extra-cover
tossed up outside off and Mushfiq stretches out to slog-sweep. Top-edges, but it loops up safely beyond midwicket
quicker, close to off stump, defended into the covers
comes down the track to loft it straight. Ball hits the outer half of the bat and loops up over the backward point region
flatter, punched to long-on
flat length ball, plays a stand-up sweep down to deep backward square leg
length ball close to off stump, presses forward, waits, and dabs gently into the backward point region
tossed up full, close to off stump, clipped down to long-on
once again, a flighted ball that lands full and close to off stump. Clips it down to long-on for another single
flighted full-toss on off stump. Makes room for the inside-out drive, hits it straight to extra-cover
shortish, a bit of width, punched to sweeper cover
short, wide, slapped to deep point. Was the googly but the line was a giveaway, the length was all wrong, and it didn't turn much either
another googly, more flight and fuller. Stretches forward, lets it come, and dabs towards backward point with soft hands
yikes. Looped up slow outside off and Muthun stretches out to reverse-sweep. Only manages a top-edge that balloons up behind the keeper
flat length ball spinning from middle to off, defended back to the bowler

down the track to this flighted ball on middle and off, and drives-inside out through extra-cover. Literally, because it went through the fielder there, Asif Ali not managing to bend down quickly enough to stop it
short on off stump and Mithun rocks back to pull to the right of long-on
short again, outside off this time. Through his pull a little early and the ball hits the toe end and rolls to straight midwicket
flighted outside off, driven to the right of sweeper cover

full outside off, uses his wrists to clip it down to long-on and walk to the other end to reach his 30th ODI fifty. A lovely little innings so far, and he's already shown in this tournament that he can push on to much bigger things
floated up wider outside off, driven to sweeper cover
flat, short, sits up, pulled to the left of deep square leg
dangled up wide of off. Slashes at it, away from his body, and slices it to the right of short third man to bring up the century partnership

googly, too short and wide to trouble Mushfiqur, who leans back and cuts it to the left of sweeper cover. They go upstairs for a run-out appeal at the keeper's end, but Mushfiqur is back in time. Would have been in real trouble had the throw been closer to the stumps - Sarfraz had to pick it up well in front of them and then dive to break the wicket
slow, flighted googly outside off. Reads it well and clips with the turn through midwicket

back of a length outside off. Not sure that was intentional. Probably not. Goes for a hard-hands punch and gets a thick edge that flies to the right of the keeper. No slip, though. Second time that's happened today
length ball close to off stump, punched to deep point
bouncer over off stump, Mithun ducks under it
back of a length close to off stump, dabbed gently past the left hand of the diving backward point fielder
back of a length on off stump, jabbed to backward point
fullish, angling into middle stump, clipped to midwicket
short, angling into off stump and cramping Mithun for room. Manages to hop and tuck it away nicely through square leg
full, angling down leg. Misses the flick and gets a tickle of pad on it down to fine leg
length ball angling into off stump from wide of the crease. Presses forward, looking for the push into the covers, ends up inside-edging into the leg side
bouncer outside off, sways his upper body away from the line
length ball on off stump, defended into the on side
back of a length on off stump, defended towards midwicket
back of a length on off stump, lets it come on and defends into the point region

another lucky boundary for Mushfiqur. Sees him coming down the track and bangs it in short. Is hurried into a pull and only manages a top edge, but he places it perfectly, right over the keeper's head
short on off stump, pulled to deep square leg. Walks to the other end - I don't think his cramps have eased off completely yet

shot! The previous short ball got up to shoulder height. This one sits up at waist height, on off stump, and Mithun pulls it handsomely to the right of midwicket to bring up his second fifty of the tournament and the second fifty of his career
back of a length close to off stump, dabs gently towards backward point and gets to the other end
length ball on off stump. Looks for another sharp single to backward point but the ball travels too quickly to the fielder to allow it
bouncer outside off and Pakistan concede more runs off the top edge. Can't control the hook and edges it to the right of fine leg
full on middle stump, clipped to midwicket
length ball angling in towards off stump. Defended with soft hands into the covers
fuller outside off, driven firmly and extra-cover moves to his right quickly to stop it
back of a length on off stump, defended back to the bowler, who offers a few choice observations after fielding the ball
fullish, angling into middle stump, clipped to midwicket
slower ball, back of a length on leg stump. He swivels to pull, but mistimes the shot to short fine leg
good length outside leg stump again, and he misses the leg-side flick. Hits his front leg and dribbles away to square leg
full on middle stump, and he comes onto the front foot to drive to mid on. They walk across for one
short on middle, but he rides the bounce to pull along the ground. The ball goes to the sweeper fielder in the deep
back of a length outside leg stump, and he rotates around his toes to paddle a sweep to deep backward square
big appeal for caught behind! But the umpire nods his head. Length ball outside leg stump, and he misses the flick off his hips. The ball hits his thighs and goes into the hands of the keeper.
full outside off stump, and he drills a cover drive straight to the fielder. Technically correct shot, but finds the man
good length on middle, and he walks inside the line of the ball, before nudging this off his hips to square leg
full just outside off, and he sticks his bat in front of his pads, and defends with soft hands
good length on off, and angling into his body. Fended off the front foot once again
Back of a length outside off, and the ball soars over the batsman's shoulders. Gobbled by Sarfraz
full just outside off, and he clobbers this right over the non-striker! Picks the length up early, and smashes this into the long-on boundary
good length on middle, and he attempts to pull off the back foot. But the ball hits his body and dribbles away to square leg
back of a length from outside off stump, and he waits for the ball to come onto him, before opening the bat's face and dabbing this down to third man for the team 150

full on his toes, and he clips this away with ease to the leg side. They're coming back for the second run, and it could be close because Mushi is struggling between the wickets but he manages to come back before Sarfraz whips the bails off. Sarfraz wants the third umpire to have a look, but the on-field ump has already made his decision
full just outside off, and he walks down the ground to defend. Comes off the bat's inside half, and rolls back to the bowler
mistimes the pull between midwicket and mid on. Wasn't short enough for that shot, and the batsman ends up splicing it on this occasion
back of a length on middle, and the batsman lets the ball come onto his body. Fended with soft hands towards cover point off the back foot
back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to fend this with the bat's open face. The ball dribbles away to short third man
full on off, and the ball's tailing in. Chips this right over midwicket, and the ball lands in no man's land. The fielder gives it a chase, as the ball slows down after hitting the ground
good length outside off stump, and coming into the batsman. But he stays on the back foot and carves a cut from near his body to point

caught and bowled! Back of a length on off, and this is too close to his body. He slogs rather uncomfortably, and takes a leading edge. The ball's in the air for a while, and Hasan Ali runs forward towards the batsman, and then takes the easiest of catches. Mithun falls after a fighting innings.
full just outside off, but angling away from the batsman. He tries to drive and the ball goes past the outside of his bat
full on middle stump, and that's been drilled off the front foot to mid on
nagging line outside off stump, and Imrul tries to drive. He's nowhere near the ball as the delivery flies past the outside of his bat
back of a length outside off, and he defends with the bat's open face to point
back of a length outside off, and he tiptoes to defend off the back foot
full and wide outside off, and Kayes throws his hands at it. Driven uppishly over cover, and he manages to clear the infield!
length ball just outside off, and he works this off his hips to midwicket. Calls early for the single, and they scamper across with ease
back of a length outside off, and he dabs this off the back foot to third man. Enough time to walk across for a single
good length outside off, but tailing into the batsman's body. Defended firmly off the front foot
good length outside off stump. The ball skids straight through, and Mushfiqur mistimes a square cut to point
good length on middle, and he taps this off his pads to the leg side. Calls early for the single before midwicket can get to the ball
full just outside off, and this is lifted right over mid off! Shadab gives the ball a chase, and manages to pull it back from near the long-off boundary
full toss on middle stump, and that's been clipped off the pads to Imam at deep square leg. Hasan gets away with a loose ball
back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to defend from near his chest. The ball rolls away towards cover point

full on middle stump, and skidding straight through! Kayes is on the back foot, and the ball hits his front leg as he tries to defend. Shadab appeals and the umpire raises his finger. Kayes asks Mushfiqur about reviewing but the senior batsman tells him to walk back. Smart choice, one reckons.
welcomes him with a length ball on middle stump. Mahmudullah carves this off the back foot to cover to get off the mark
good length outside off, and Mushfiqur tries to reverse-paddle this fine. But the ball goes straight to short third man
tossed up on off stump, and spinning into Mushfiqur. Defended off the back foot
length ball, but slightly wide outside off. Tapped off the back foot to point
tossed up on off stump, and he pushes at this right past the bowler's right for a single
back of a length on middle, and he uses the depth of the crease to muscle a pull past midwicket. Long on gives it a chase, but the ball wins the race to the midwicket boundary
length ball on off, and the ball straightens after pitching. Worked off his hips to midwicket off the back foot
back of a length on off, and flicked off his pads to the vacant square-leg region
full on leg stump, and pushed with the angled bat to midwicket. A wild throw to the bowler almost makes it go for an overthrow, but mid off was backing up
good length outside off, and he cuts the ball off the back foot. But the shot is bottom-edged onto the ground and straight into Sarfraz's gloves
full just outside off, and tapped off the front foot to cover. Seven off the over
length ball outside off, and the legbreak takes it away from the batsman. He mistimes the cut to point
full toss outside off, and Mushfiqur's eyes light up. Swings across the line, and the ball lands in no man's land! Long on was far away
full toss on off stump, and driven down the ground to long on
good length on off, and skidding through. Fended off the back foot to cover
good length outside off, and spinning into the batsman. Cut past point to the fielder in the deep
good length outside off, and he pulls this off the back foot to deep midwicket
full on middle stump, and comfortably whipped off his pads to deep backward square. Runs back fast for the second run, and the throw from the deep is pretty weak
full just outside off stump, and he drives through the ball's line to extra cover for a walking single
back of a length outside off, and tapped off the back foot to point with the angled bat
full on off stump, and his leg-side whip takes a leading edge to Imam at wide cover

good length on off, and tapped off the front foot to mid on. The fielder - Shadab - fails to pick up the ball, and therefore the batsman complete a comfortable single. Could've been dangerous otherwise
yorker on leg stump, but he manages to wedge this away to the leg side.
tossed up full on off stump, clipped to long-on
tossed up slow, wide of off stump, swept along the ground to the left of deep midwicket
googly, a touch short, stabbed to cover point. Interesting field - cover point is in the circle and there's a deep extra-cover back. Usually it's the other way round
flatter, front of the hand. Skids through close to off stump, no turn, and Mahmudullah, looking to punch to deep extra cover, ends up stabbing it back to the bowler
another googly, turns in towards off stump as Mahmudullah looks to make room. Punched to cover point
tossed up much slower on off stump and Mahmudullah, tied down by those dot balls, looks for the slog-sweep to release the pressure. Ends up top-edging it loopily to the right of the keeper
full, angling into the pads, clipped to long leg

ooh, edged past the diving keeper. Nicely bowled, back of a length and it nips away off the seam. Looks to dab it down to third man, ends up edging it much finer than intended, but gets four runs for it
and he'll stay there for now. Full, into the blockhole on off stump. Jabbed back to the bowler

gone, that's beautifully bowled! Mushfiqur falls one short of what would have been a magnificent hundred. Fullish outside off, and again he gets it to nip away off the track, against the angle. Looks to drive it with an open face, and only manages an edge through to the keeper
back of a length, angling into off stump. Shuffles across and works it to the right of mid-on
shot! That's full outside off, and Mahmudullah makes a bit of extra room to slap that powerfully to the point boundary
short, wide, and that's brilliantly played. Stabbed with an open face to beat backward point to his left
tossed up fuller, clipped down to long-on
flatter legbreak, on a good length close to off stump. Looks to drive into the covers, ends up inside-edging into the on side
again he's a little early on the drive as Shadab flights this outside off. Ends up hitting it back to the bowler instead of through the covers
shortish, just a bit of width, punched away to the left of sweeper cover
flighted googly on off stump. Strides forward and clips into the square leg region
thigh-high full-toss on leg stump, tucked away to long leg
back of a length outside off, steered to the right of third man
fullish, slanting down leg. Looks to flick and misses, rolls into the leg side off the front pad
back of a length on off stump, opens his bat face and dabs behind point
full on off stump, driven firmly and extra-cover is back on the 30-yard circle, allowing the quick single
slower length ball close to off stump. Presses forward, lets it come, and eases it to deep point
back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to work it to long leg
back of a length close to off stump, gets it to straighten off the pitch. Only offers half a bat, looking to guide it down to third man with an open face, and the ball slides past his outside edge
fuller outside off, and Mahmudullah drives crisply to sweeper cover. He's a little cross with himself - may have wanted to hit it squarer
digs it in and gets it to climb towards Mehidy's right shoulder. Does well to step across and control the pull down to deep square leg
back of a length slower one outside off. Whipped away to deep square leg. Wanted to hit it through the off side. I think, and went too early so he had to adjust with a roll of his wrists
short, rising ball in the corridor. Gets off his toes to ride the bounce and squeeze it to the left of backward point
goes nice and full to start his new spell, close to off stump. Clipped to midwicket

gone! Again, he goes full, angling in towards off stump. Isn't quite a yorker, and that works against Mehidy as he looks to flick this over midwicket. Not full enough to force him to play along the ground, too full to give him the elevation to get it over the fielder, and in the end he offers him a chest-high catch
length ball close to off stump, defended to short extra-cover. Good thinking to have that fielder save the single at this stage, and keep Mashrafe on strike
length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
yorker on off stump, opens his bat face slightly to squeeze a single to the left of extra-cover

good bouncer, rising sharply over off stump and cramping Mahmudullah with the angle. Looks to hook but he's late on the shot, and the ball may have grazed the helmet through to the keeper - might explain why Junaid got excited for a moment, believing he'd edged it
short offcutter, comes in towards middle and off to cramp Mashrafe slightly, and he leans away from the line to dab it down to third man
short outside off, pulled in the air, one-bounce, to deep square leg
full on off stump, makes a bit of room and lifts this over extra-cover. The sweeper sprints to his right to mop up
slower ball, quite full. Saw the batsman look to make room and followed him. Mashrafe gives it a big heave and misses, and the ball doesn't miss leg stump by much
another slower ball but this one is short. Nice sound off the bat as he pulls this, but straight to the man at deep square leg
another slower short ball, Mahmudullah plays a checked pull - just meets it with the bat face closed just so - down to long leg
down the track and Junaid fires it into Mahmudullah's feet. Gets his front leg out of the way and squeezes a single out to extra-cover

nicely bowled. Sensed Mashrafe's desire to make himself room and bowled a back-of-a-length ball angling into leg stump and cramping him for room. Looked to flick, and only managed an inside-edge down to fine leg

bowled him! Length ball angling into off stump, and perhaps Mahmudullah was better served looking to hit down the ground. Went across the line instead - midwicket was inside the circle - and ended up missing completely. That's four for Junaid now. He's been utterly brilliant today
length ball angling into off stump, stays in the crease and defends to midwicket
full now, angling into middle stump, clears his front leg and drives along the ground to long-on
back of a length, angling down leg. Tucked off the hip to long leg
shortish, angling into leg stump and cramping Mashrafe for room - he's got to be less predictable with his initial movement - and his attempted pull rolls gently to midwicket
wow. For once he gets the swinging room he wants, and he takes full toll. Makes room once more, Hasan bowls back of a length on off stump, and Mashrafe absolutely clobbers it over midwicket
low full-toss on off stump, opens his bat face and steers to deep point

Oh dear, that's a terrible way to get run out.Length ball on off stump, looks to clear his front leg and flat-bat to long-off. The bowler moves to his left and cuts the ball off, and the batsmen still look to steal a quick single. Bit of a brain fade, and the bowler simply has to jog to the stumps and flick the bails off

and that's that. Back of a length slower ball on off stump, Mashrafe makes himself room as always, and goes for the big hit down the ground. The boundaries here are massive, and there's no way he's clearing that man at long-on
full and wide from around the wicket, and Fakhar cracks a cut to point off the back foot
full just outside off stump. Angling into Fakhar, and defended with soft hands
length ball outside off, and he punches this down the ground to mid off to get off the mark
full on middle stump, and he defends this towards the leg side with the angled bat. Square leg cleans up

full and wide outside off, and he drills this straight to mid on! This is hit very hard but Rubel throws himself into the air, and the ball sticks in his hand! Another failure for Fakhar. This is an extraordinary catch. Fakhar looks shellshocked after using his feet to get to the delivery's pitch.
good length on off, and spinning into the right-hander. Punched off the back foot to mid on
full outside off, and angling further away. He tries to drive through the covers, but the ball hits the inside-half of his bat and dribbles back to the bowler

big shout for lbw! And given. Full on middle and leg, and the ball skids straight through. Babar tries to defend from near his pads, but the ball stays low and hits his front back leg. Imam suggests Babar shouldn't review. He's walking back. Impact was in front of off stump.
full outside leg stump, and swinging further away. Sarfraz misses the flick and Mushfiqur dives to his left to intercept
full just outside off, and this cover drive has been caressed through the off side! Beautiful shot to get off the mark. Just a simple push and the outfield does the rest
length ball on leg stump, and that's been flicked off his pads to square leg
good length on middle stump, and he works this off his pads to deep backward square
good length on off stump, and he blocks off the front foot. The ball dribbles away to the bowler
full on off stump, and turning into the batsman. Tapped off the front foot to mid on
full outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to check a drive to cover
length ball just outside off, and spinning away. Defended off the front foot
full on off stump, and this is driven straight to cover. They want the single, but the ball has gone straight to the fielder
full on leg stump, and worked off his toes to deep midwicket
good length on off, and he taps this with the spin off the back foot. The ball rolls away to mid on
length ball angling in, and he whips this off his pads to the leg side for a single
back of a length outside leg stump, and this has been easily nudged off his hips! Played fine, and races away to the fine-leg boundary

edged to the keeper! Full outside off, and angling further away. Sarfraz tries to drive this away from his body, but the ball takes the feather-edge and the catch is gobbled by the diving keeper to his right. Excellent work in the field by Bangladesh thus far. Another failure for Sarfraz
good length on middle, and he walks to the off side, before defending off the back foot

full on off and Malik offers the bat's full face to mid off. Hesitation in the run, but Mahmudullah fails to gather the ball. He was looking at the batsmen, instead of looking at the ball. Malik would've been out if the collection was clean
good length on middle stump, and angling down leg. Imam misses the flick, and the ball goes through to the keeper
full on middle stump, and that's been whipped off his pads to deep square leg. They jog across for one
right on the money. Full on off stump, and defended off the front foot
length ball, but wide outside off. The ball stays low, and he mistimes a cut to cover point
full ball on off stump from around the wicket. Imam takes a small stride forward, and defends with soft hands
good length outside off, but angling in slightly. Too close to Imam's body for the cut, and he mistimes the shot to cover point
swing and a miss! Wide outside off, and Imam tries to slap this square. The ball goes just over his bat, deceived by the extra pace on this occasion
full just outside off, and driven straight back past the bowler's right. But mid off runs to his left and intercepts
full on off stump, and he leans forward to defend with soft hands
through him! Length ball on middle, and cutting the batsman in half! The ball slides inwards after pitching, and it whizzes through the bat-pad gap. Just over the top of off stump
full on middle, and he covers his off stump to defend off the front foot
full on middle stump, and he shuffles across towards the off side. Defends this with the straight bat to the bowler
full just outside off, and he leans into the drive. Struck well, but it goes straight to cover. Five dots so far
full on middle stump, and he works this off his pads to the leg side. Back-to-back maidens for Bangladesh
full on middle stump, but Imam misses the flick off his pads. Hits his front leg, and Mashrafe appeals but the umpire isn't interested. Would've gone down leg
good length on off and he whips this off his hips with the angle. The ball races away to deep midwicket
good length on off, and he walks down the ground and then defends this straight towards the non-striker
back of a length outside off, and Malik stays on the back foot for this one. Punches this towards mid off, and takes off for a quick single
stays low! Length ball outside off, but angling into Imam. He tiptoes and defends this towards the leg side
full on off stump, and Imam takes a big stride forward to defend off the front foot
full outside off, and Malik check-drives off the front foot. But the off-side field is packed, and the ball is intercepted by cover
full on off stump, and this is the offcutter from Fizz. Malik leans into a front-foot defense and taps this towards the off side
full on off stump, and that's been caressed down the ground for a boundary! Strikes this through the ball's line, forcing Imam to spread his legs, and the ball races away past mid off
back of a length outside off, but Malik rides the bounce and then slaps a cut-shot in front of square for back-to-back boundaries!
back of a length outside off, and he punches this with the angled bat. Straight to point, who has a shy at the bowler's end. Hits the stumps but Imam is in.
good length on off stump, and he offers his bat's full face. Punched past the non-striker to mid on
full on off stump, and this has been flicked off his toes to deep square leg
full on middle stump, and defended off the front foot. Firmly struck
good length just outside off, and he dabs this fine to third man for a single
full just outside off stump, and this is defended with soft hands towards over
good length on off stump, and he blocks this off the front foot once again
good length outside off, but angling into the batsman. Blocked off the front foot
full on middle stump, and spinning away after landing. Blocked off the front foot
full outside off stump, and this is loopier from Mehidy. The front-foot defense comes off the bat's inside half
extra flight on off stump, and Imam drives this firmly to mid off. But can't get the single
full just outside off, and the ball grips the surface slightly. Imam's through his punch too early, and he splices the shot to mid on
full outside off stump, and defended with the turn off the front foot
stays low! Full ball just outside off, but hurries onto the batsman. Manages to get his bat down in time, and taps this towards the leg side
sees Imam shaping to make room and follows him with a fairly full one on leg stump. Defended into the off side
length ball angling into middle stump, clipped to midwicket
comes down the track and this time he gets some width outside off. Slashes hard, over the infield, but only as far as the fielder at deep point
back of a length on off stump, defended into the point region
length ball outside off, nice stride forward to defend to extra-cover
back of a length, angling into a fourth-stump line. Defended to mid-on
nice length outside off, goes on the back foot and punches it back to the bowler
fuller now, presses forward to push into the covers
nice flight, a bit closer to off stump, driven down the ground to long-off

a bit of dip now, on off stump. Looks to come forward to try and clip into the on side, but ends up playing it back to the bowler as the ball drops shorter than expected and doesn't turn as much as expected
fuller, clipped to long-on
quicker length ball on off stump, stays in the crease and defends into the cover point region
back of a length close to off stump, chopped to backward point
back of a length on middle stump, whipped away nicely to the left of long leg
length ball angling into off stump, defended to mid-on
length ball close to off stump, punched on the up to sweeper cover. He's been timing these front-foot shots beautifully today
down the track now and he makes a bit of room. Mashrafe offers some too, bowling a pretty full one outside off, and Imam flat-bats it in the air, into the gap to the right of mid-off
down the track again and Mashrafe angles it into the batsman this time. Looks to open his bat face and push square on the off side, ends up edging to third man instead
tossed up nicely outside off, and Malik strides forward for the straight-bat push to long-on
down the track and Mehidy angles this one in, full, denying room and forcing Imam to clip to midwicket
full on off stump, again bowled slightly round-arm to create an angle into the batsman. Driven to long-on
floated up slow and full outside off, and Malik drives once more, bat scrupulously straight, to long-on
flat, slides on with the angle towards leg stump. Stays on the back foot, opens up, and punches down to long-on
a touch short, quite wide too, slapped to the fielder at point
back of a length, slanting across to off stump, Imam stabs to backward point with an open bat-face
full, close to off stump, drives to mid-off and keeps running as an extension of his front-foot stride. Puts pressure on the fielder and he fumbles as he tries to close down the ball quickly
length ball close to off stump, shows the full face to punch to mid-on
back of a length outside off, punched to the left of cover
full on off stump, driven firmly to mid-off
length ball slanting into a line close to off stump. Steps back and across, waits, and guides to third man with an open face
back of a length close to off stump, flat-batted down to long-on
back of a length, turning towards leg stump, clipped to deep backward square leg
back of a length, goes with the angle towards middle stump. Makes some room and punches to sweeper cover
short, wide, slapped, but straight to the fielder at cover point
quickish length ball close to off stump, pushes gently into the point region and sprints to the other end
floated up slow outside off, driven to deep point
back of a length close to off stump, steered down to third man
back of a length outside off, opens the face of his bat to dab towards third man
length ball on middle stump, clipped to the right of deep square leg
bouncer rising high over leg stump, well over head height, Imam ducks under it
length ball angling across to off stump, defended to extra-cover
length ball close to off stump, Imam plays a checked drive to mid-off
back of a length, too straight, tickled off the pads and he manages to place it extremely fine
back of a length, spins in quite sharply towards off stump as Malik makes himself a bit of room. Punched to cover point
back of a length again, this time he stays put and goes down the ground, picks up a punched single to long-on
tossed up full on off stump, driven to long-on
full on middle stump, driven to midwicket
full on middle stump once more, gets his front leg out of the way and drives to long-on
shortish, and only the tiniest bit of width, but Imam puts it away nicely, goes deep in his crease to cut to the right of backward point. Slows down as it nears the boundary, though
... pretty much exactly for that shot. Back of a length outside off, opens his bat face, attempting to pick up another steered single to third man
full on off stump, driven towards mid-off
bouncer over leg stump, Imam crouches low to evade it. Leaves the bat pointing up like a periscope, but the ball's well clear of it

another short ball, this one gets up to a better height, just over his chest and over off stump, and Imam has to drag his pull a little. Hits it in the air but it lands well short of the man on the square leg boundary
length ball close to off stump, defended to mid-off
back of a length outside off. Shuffles all the way across and tucks it to long leg
back of a length outside off stump, punched crisply to deep point
short, down the leg side, pulled to the left of fine leg
back of a length on leg stump, tucked away to fine leg
shortish outside off, opens his bat face and steers to third man
length ball on off stump, lets it come on and guides it to third man
full outside off, driven to long-off

Mashrafe takes a screamer! Full on middle, and he attempts to chip this over midwicket, but the fielder dives like Superman and takes an amazing catch to remove the batsman. Malik looks absolutely gobsmacked.
good length just outside off, and fended off the back foot
back of a length outside off, but skidding through to the keeper. Shadab offers no shot
good length outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
back of a length outside off, and Shadab walks across to the off side. Drills a punch off the back foot to cover, but can't pinch the single
full on off, and he pushes at this off the front foot. The ball's come off the bat's sweet spot, and beats mid on. Shadab gets off the mark
full on middle stump, and he defends off the front foot. The ball trickles away to mid on
back of a length on leg stump, and flicked off the hips to deep backward square
full on off stump, and Imam takes a big stride forward to defend
good length outside off, and Imam taps this with soft hands to point for a quick single
overpitched just outside off stump. Shadab keeps his eyes on the ball and fends this with soft hands. Almost a yorker
good length outside off, and Shadab tries to cut this square. Bottom-edges it towards point
tossed up just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover
flighted full on off stump. Shadab carefully taps this to cover off the front foot
overpitched on middle stump, and this has been wedged to cover. Shadab wants the single, but sharp work in the field ensures he must scamper back into the crease
full on leg, and spinning further in. Defended to mid on
length ball on middle, and turning into Shadab. Punched off the back foot to mid on
full on middle stump, and the confident-looking drive is stopped by the diving cover fielder
good length on off, and angling into his pads. Worked off his hips to square leg for a single
full on middle stump, and he covers his stumps to defend off the back foot
full on middle stump, and he clips this smartly off his toes to midwicket. But can't seem to find the gap at all
full just outside off, and driven with soft hands to mid off. But cover runs to his right and intercepts the ball
full on leg stump, and he misses the leg-side flick. Hits his front leg and rolls away to midwicket
good length on the fourth-stump line, and his back-foot punch takes the outside edge to third man. Bangladesh won't mind since that puts Shadab back on strike for the next over
full on off stump, and he drives through the front foot. Stopped by Soumya at cover
good length on middle, and spinning into his legs. Pushed to the leg side
full just outside off, and the expansive cover drive is sharply stopped by Soumya. He then has a shy at the bowler's stumps, but misses the direct hit. Imam would've been gone if that hit!
full on off, and he drives with the angled bat off the front foot. But stopped by the back off-side field
full on off, and spinning into Shadab. Defended with soft hands to cover as the infielders come charging in to stop the single
flighted on middle stump, and the straight drive is drilled to long off for a single. Shadab keeps the strike again
back of a length on middle stump, and the pull has taken a top-edge through to Liton Das! Shadab's frustrating knock comes to an end. His maiden ODI wicket
good length just outside off stump. He defends with the bat's open face to cover point
full just outside off, and angling into the batsman. Fended
good length outside off, and he carves a cut with the bat's open face to third man. Gets off the mark
full just outside off, and he waits for the slower ball to get to him. Opens his bat's face and runs this down to third man
good length, but tight on the fourth-stump line. Punched off the back foot to cover point
full on off stump, and pushed off the front foot to mid on. Well stopped by Soumya, whose been electric on the field today
full on off stump, and the ball turns away after pitching. Fended off the front foot
good length outside off, and angling into the batsman. Too close to his body for the cut, and he misses the shot. But Liton misses too, and that allows Imam to scamper across for byes
good length just outside off stump, and he turns this off his hips to deep midwicket for a walking single
full just outside off, and pushed to cover point for a quick single. Mehidy has a shy at the stumps, but misses
full on off stump, and whipped off his pads to midwicket
full just outside off. Asif walks down the wicket, and drives with the straight bat to mid off
back of a length outside off stump, and he swivels to pull right over midwicket! Lands just short of the boundary
good length on off, and angling inwards. Misses the leg-side flick as the ball hits his groin region. Ouch!
good length on middle stump, and clipped off his hips to midwicket for a single
low full toss on middle and leg, as Imam tries to muscle a drive. Mistimes it to mid off
full just outside off, and spinning into the batsman. Defended
flat on off, and angling in. Worked off his hips to square leg
full just outside off stump, and that's been nudged to point
good length on off, and worked off his pads to the leg side for a single
full on middle stump, and driven down the ground to wide long on
full just outside off, and pushed past cover for a jogging single
overpitched on middle stump, and drilled down the ground to long on
good length outside off stump, and going straight through. Cut off the back foot to point
good length on leg stump, and he works this off his pads to midwicket for another walking single
full just outside off stump, and pushed off the front foot to cover point. Can't beat the infield. Required run rate now 6.5
good length outside off stump, and the skidder can't be cut away. Through to the keeper
good length outside off again, and it hurries onto the batsman. Defended back to the bowler
full on off stump, driven to long-off
short outside off, an ordinary delivery, slapped away to the right of cover point
back of a length close to off stump, defended back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, stretches out to block back to the bowler
nicely played. Strays slightly onto leg stump and he quickly gets down on one knee to paddle to long leg
floated up full on leg stump and there's Imam's fifty, brings it up with a quietly clipped single to long-on
down the track, gets close to the pitch of the ball to drive to long-off
flighted and pitched right up on off stump, driven to long-off
flatter now, on leg stump and pitched up. Whipped to midwicket
full on off stump, driven inside-out to sweeper cover
flighted delivery on off stump, driven past the diving midwicket fielder and down to long-on
back of a length. slides on with the angle to leg stump. Punched to long-on
flighted ball wide of off stump, driven to deep point
full on off stump, looks to pick up a driven single to long-on and succeeds, but only because the midwicket fielder fumbles the ball and lets it slip through his fingers
back of a length on off stump, punched to long-on

length ball, a bit of width, and that's a beautiful shot. Great hands here from Asif, and great footwork too. Goes deep in his crease to manufacture some shortness of length, and slices it away to the left of backward point
tossed up outside off, presses forward and pushes gently into the covers to pick up a quick single. Puts pressure on the extra-cover fielder, Sarkar, who rushes in and fails to pick up cleanly
tossed up outside off, defended into the covers

and he creates a chance first ball! Only it's dropped. Back of a length, the cutter, leaves the batsman off the pitch as he attempts to steer to third man. Straightforward catch to the right of Liton behind the stumps. He goes one-handed, casually, and the ball bounces off his glove
back of a length on off stump, defended into the point region
back of a length on middle stump. Stays leg-side of the ball and looks to dab into the point region. Ball doesn't cut away as much as expected and he inside-edges into the on side
back of a length on off stump, looks for the pushed single into the covers but the fielder runs in quickly and denies him
length ball on leg stump, clipped to deep square leg
fullish on middle stump. Looks to flick and ends up hitting it straighter than intended, and doesn't time it at all, which helps him get a single since it rolls slowly towards mid-on
shot! Jumps out of his crease, gets one angled into his hitting arc, full, and just clatters it over wide long-on. First six of the innings
poor ball, angling down leg, clipped away to the right of long leg
length ball on off stump, punched down the ground to long-on
back of a length on middle and off, clipped to midwicket
shortish and fairly wide, chopped down to third man
fullish on middle and leg, driven firmly back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, opens his bat face to steer down to third man, past the diving gully fielder
fullish outside off, nips in off the pitch. Looks to push into the covers and gets a thick inside edge into the backward square leg region
back of a length outside off, guided down to third man
back of a length outside off, manages to beat that gully fielder and steer the ball down to third man again
back of a length, quite wide, dabbed down to third man once more. Do Bangladesh need any other fielders at present?
good ball. Fullish and wide outside off, slanting away further. Not quite driving length and Asif slashes and misses. An edge could have brought the gully fielder into play
back of a length close to off stump, steered down to third man again
length ball on off stump, presses forward and eases it to sweeper cover
on the pads, tucked away to the left of deep square leg and they run the first one hard to create the chance of a fairly comfortable second
back of a length outside off, open face, third man, etc.

back of a length close to off stump, dabbed gently towards backward point, who's on the edge of the circle. Ooh, and Mashrafe has overstepped too. Actually, nope. It's a no-ball because Bangladesh had five fielders outside the 30-yard circle.
stays in the crease and gets a full slower ball outside off. Drives hard, but straight to mid-off
angles into the pads, and Imam tucks it away to deep square leg
nice flight, goes with the angle towards middle stump. Clipped away through square leg
down the track, not quite to the pitch of this slider coming in towards the stumps. Shows the full face to pick up another single to long-on
back of a length, goes deep in his crease to work this with the turn to deep backward square leg
flat slider that cramps Imam for room slightly. Makes up by going deep in his crease, and punches to long-on
not quite short enough to cut, this, and it goes on straight to beat the outside edge
goes back to a flat length ball on off stump, punches it back to the bowler
back of a length, slanting across to off stump. Looks to work it against the angle and gets a leading edge back down the pitch

dug in short, slanting away from off stump, and Imam miscues his pull. Had to drag it from fairly wide, and it popped up briefly in the air, but midwicket was on the boundary and it was safely to the left of mid-on too
back of a length on middle and leg, tucked away to deep square leg
full on middle stump, clipped to the left of deep square leg
short on off stump, pulled to deep square leg
length ball on middle stump, clipped towards mid-on, who's on the edge of the circle
length ball on middle and off, looks like the floater that keeps going with the angle. Watches it well and defends into the covers

ooh, that's superb glovework to follow a beauty of a delivery. Classic offspinner's dismissal, lovely flight outside off and it's the one that drifts away slightly and continues along that trajectory after pitching. Draws Asif forward, makes him reach for the ball, and in the process causes him to lift his back foot out of the crease. Liton collects and removes the bails in one motion, and Bangladesh are back on top once more
the arm ball first up, slides in and cramps him for room. Defended hurriedly into the covers
a bit more flight now, draws him forward, defended back to the bowler
another skiddy arm ball. Stays back and defends into the on side
fuller now, comes forward to defend into the off side
full outside off stump, and driven with the angled bat to deep extra cover
full on leg stump, and he tries to flick this to square leg. But the ball hits his front leg and they scamper off for a single
uses his feet. Full on off and spinning away. And he drives straight to mid off
full on middle and leg, and he uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball. Tapped straight, but straight to mid on

Oh dear, he's gone down the wicket! Length ball, but wide outside off stump. Imam's halfway down the track, and the ball is too far away from him. Deceived by the seam-up arm ball, and Liton Das displays some excellent glovework
full just outside off stump. Spins inwards, and that's been cut to short third man. Liton tries to do a Dhoni, by attempting a flick the throw onto the stumps, but not everyone is Dhoni
full on middle stump, and the straight drive is stopped by Mehidy
good length outside off, and punched off the back foot with the angled bat
overpitched on middle stump, and the front-foot drive is stopped by cover
full on off, and he goes down on one knee to slog across the line. Mistimed to deep midwicket
flighted full outside off, and he drills a drive straight to Soumya Sarkar at cover. Well stopped
tossed up on off, and he shovels a drive to deep extra cover. Mehidy finishes with 2 for 28
full outside leg stump, and the straight drive takes an inside-edge onto his pads, and then rolls away to short third man for one
arm ball outside off stump. It's a half-tracker, but the batsman can't put it away. The punch goes straight to Mashrafe
good length on off, and spinning into the batsman. He backs away to cut, but the ball is inside-edged onto his body
length ball on middle stump. The ball goes down the leg side
big appeal for lbw but not given. It's a slider that angles in after landing on off. Hits his front leg, but would've clearly missed leg stump
full on off, and spinning sharply inwards now. Pushed to mid off
good length on leg stump, and cramping the batsman for space. Whipped away to square leg. Mahmudullah finishes with 1 for 38
good length on middle stump, but angling into his pads. Misses the flick, and the delivery hits his front leg. Muted appeal for lbw, but the ball was always angling down leg
full outside off stump. Angling further away, but Hasan frees his arms, and slaps this over cover! Bounces just inside the boundary
length ball angling away once again. Tries to cut this square, but bottom-edges it to point instead
full on middle stump, and Hasan has no option but to tap it towards point. Wants the single, but Mehidy has pounced onto this stray ball in a flash
back of a length on off, and he swings hard towards the leg side. But he's toe-ended this shot, and the skyer is comfortably taken at mid on running to his left
good length outside off, and punched off the back foot to deep point. Enough time to run back for the second, but they choose not to
good length outside off, and angling away from the left-hander. Tries to muscle a cut away, but mistimes to point
short outside leg stump, and soaring over the batsman's head. Left alone
full outside off, and the slower ball goes through to Liton on the bounce. The batsman can't get bat to it
back of a length on middle, and the extra bounce deceives the batsman. Tries to pull square, but the bat's nowhere near the ball
full on middle and leg, and that's been drilled to the left of long on for a single. Wild throw from the deep, but there's no extra run conceded
full outside leg stump, and he works this to wide long on once again. Just a single though. NRR touching 11 now
inside-edged but doesn't chop onto the stumps. Full and wide outside off, and the expansive cover drive comes off the bat's inside edge, and almost hits off stump

holes out to deep midwicket A gentle length ball angling into his body, and he tries to pull this over the mid-wicket boundary. Hits it well, but not well enough. The substitute keeps his calm near the boundary
yorker on leg stump, and he does well to dig this away to the leg side
full outside off stump, and angling further away. He swings and misses
just misses the off stump! Full on off stump, and he drives inside the line of the ball. The ball just goes past his outside edge and through to Liton
full on middle stump, and the straight drive takes an outside edge to third man for a single
dropped by Liton! Fizz misses out on his fifth wicket. Full outside off, and the cover drive takes an outside edge to the keeper's left. Goes in and out of his gloves
Afridi doing an Afridi! Full on off and he swings across the line, and connects so well with it... that it flies over the midwicket boundary for a maximum
low full toss on middle stump. Shaheen backs away to slog at this, but he toe-ends the shot back to Rubel
another low full toss, but this is outside off stump. Slaps a shot to deep extra cover for a single
full just outside off, and drilled down the ground to mid off for a quick single
full on middle stump, and he muscles a drive to wide long on for a single

full just outside off stump, and he drives this down the ground past mid off. They could've come back for a second run, but looks like Pakistan are slowly giving up. Settling for <strike> a single</strike> no run
short outside off stump. Shaheen considers pulling, but eventually lets it go
another short ball. Slower this time, and Shaheen swings wildly in a bid to pull. Can't connect at all
back of a length, but it's the offcutter from Fizz. Lands on middle and angles into his body. He dabs a late cut to short third man for a single
wiiild swing! Length ball on middle, and going away from Junaid. He comes down the ground and tries to swing across the line, but the bat's nowhere near the ball
length ball outside off, and
overpitched on middle stump. Mistimed to mid off after toe-ending the drive
full and wide outside off. Shaheen muscles a toe-ended drive to deep point for one
back of a length on middle stump. Well directed, and it angles in to smack the batsman right near his wrist. Hope he's unhurt
back of a length outside leg stump, and cramping Shaheen for space. Mistimes a pull to the off side
back of a length outside leg stump, and he misses the pull shot. The ball goes over his bat and through to Liton
full on leg stump, and he clears his front leg to swing across the line. Mistimes the shot to long off
full just outside off stump, and the cover drive is drilled straight to mid off. That's the over
good length on off, and he drags a pull to Shanto at deep midwicket. One bounce to the fielder
good length outside off stump, and Shaheen misses the cut. Goes over the bat and through to the keeper
full on off stump, and mistimed down the ground past Mustafizur. Mid off intercepts
good length just outside off, and he misses the straight drive on this occasion. Just past the outside of his bat
back of a length on off stump, and blocked off the back foot
full just outside off, and carefully defended off the front foot to cover point. Bangladesh win by 37 runs!
